items.title: Complete Course in Autodesk 3ds Max 2021

visible_instructors.title: CADCIM Technologies
visible_instructors.job_title: Leading eLearning Content for CAD, BIM, and Animation
visible_instructors.name: CADCIM

items.headline: A Master Course
objectives_summary: The students will  learn the basics of 3D modeling, texturing, and lighting along with 3D rendering. Also, they will learn the concept of  rigging, animation, physics in MassFX, and particle system. This course helps to understand advance techniques like Panoramic 360 degree view, Crowd simulation, and Arnold and Vray rendering. Also the students will be able to work on stunning environments and realistic virtual reality experiences using 3ds max interactive. The 3ds Max tutorials in this course take your creative skills to the next level. Overall, the course will help the students master the software and enhance their creativity and productivity.

items.title: SketchUp + Photoshop: Digital Watercolor Renderings in 3 Hrs

visible_instructors.title: Adam Zollinger
visible_instructors.job_title: Digital Artist & Instructor - 3ds Max / V-Ray / Photoshop
visible_instructors.name: Adam

items.headline: Render your SketchUp models quickly and with a great digital watercolor technique using a SketchUp to Photoshop workflow
objectives_summary: Be able to quickly create compelling architectural illustrations using only SketchUp & Photoshop.
The instructor will show not only show you how to use these techniques, but explain why to use them - giving you a deep understanding of the illustration process.
Use the provided SketchUp file or follow along with your 3d model to create a "digital watercolor" in just a few hours.
